title: Webrick – PHP Router
description: Lightweight router with groups/domains, signed & temporary URLs, pre/post middleware, compression, cache validators, throttling, and route caching.

title: InterMix
description: Developer-first PHP toolkit: PSR-11 DI container, macros/mixins, memoization, and cache helpers.

title: UID
description: UUID, ULID, Snowflake, Sonyflake, NanoID, Cuid2 — a consistent, fast PHP API.

title: OTP
description: All-in-one OTP: stateless generic OTP, TOTP (RFC 6238), HOTP (RFC 4226), OCRA (RFC 6287).

title: ArrayKit
description: Expressive array utilities for day-to-day data wrangling in PHP.

title: LocalDock
description: Docker-based local dev environment for PHP with optional stacks (DB, Redis, ES/Kibana, Mongo, and more).

title: Devtainer
description: Container images and scripts tailored for fast PHP dev cycles.

title: Toolset
description: CLI and shell helpers to accelerate routine dev/ops tasks.

title: Pathwise
description: Lightweight filesystem utilities and helpers for file-centric workflows.

title: Game-Draw
description: Example app for a luck-based draw; demonstrates clean, testable PHP modules.
